explains: n. 乘务员，船员（通常指男性）

sentences.en: The combat vehicle crewman uniform is not intended for wear as an all purpose uniform.
sentences.cn: 战斗车辆乘员制服不适合作为通用制服穿着。

sentences.en: It said one crewman had died of a stroke while being held captive.
sentences.cn: 该公司表示，一名船员在被劫持期间因中风死亡。

sentences.en: Was the first crewman to replace Zanuka as Employee of the Month.
sentences.cn: 他是第一个船员代替咋努卡成为月度最佳员工。
